text: Before sitting down for his Thanksgiving dinner, Tyler Baltierra tweeted about how ` ` rough'' his holiday will be without his wife, Teen Mom OG star Catelynn Lowell. ` ` My god! My wife looks absolutely beautiful in this [ Happy Thanksgiving ] [ Teen Mom ] clip,'' Baltierra tweeted on Thursday. ` ` It ’ s going to be a rough holiday without being able to kiss her & tell her how thankful I am for her, but we have a strong resilience crafted by our past, we got this!''
